@GetMapping(value="posts",
            produces="application/hal+json")

      • addPost

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')")
@PostMapping("posts/add/{userId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addPost​(@RequestBody
                                                          Post post,
                                                          @PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.Long userId,
                                                          org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder b)
        Adds post to database using postRepository.
        Parameters:
        post - containing info about post
        userId - containing id of the user
        b - builder related to this action to build a location URI for response headers.
        Returns:
        HTTP status 201 when succesful.

      • deletePost

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')")
@DeleteMapping("posts/{postId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deletePost​(@PathVariable
                                                             java.lang.Long postId)
        Delete post from database using postRepository.
        Parameters:
        postId - containing id of the post
        Returns:
        HTTP status no content if succesful
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if no posts with given id was found.
